product_name: Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Long Underwear Zip-T - Men's
long_description: Built with a deep ventilating zipper and built-in odor control, the mens' Capilene 3 Midweight long underwear Zip-T provides excellent insulation in cold weather by trapping heat against your skin. The most versatile of Patagonia's performance base layers, Capilene 3 stretches, dries quickly, breathes well and resists wear. The fabric is brushed on the inside for warmth and has a smooth knit face that glides easily between layers. Polygiene(R) permanent odor control resists odors so you can breathe easy after a long day of activity. Deep front zipper lets you ventilate instantly to keep you cool during exertion, and thumb loops hold sleeves over wrists for warmth. Shoulders with offset seams won't chafe beneath pack straps and side seams roll forward to minimize abrasion. The mens' Capilene 3 Midweight long underwear Zip-T offers a next-to-skin fit.
